body:
Hey everyone!

I hope you've had a great week and congrats to Barca for winning the ECL. I'm slightly fed up with the server. It's some of the staff and how things are run and I know I'm not the only one feeling this way. People are leaving for these reasons as the old Avicus they once knew has become destroyed.

title: Tough Times

replies.body: Instead of you know, being negative, maybe email support about how the staff team can function better?
